coins.name: cope coin
coins.details: Assigns damage or loss of from one stat to another and prevents critical hits

coins.name: copy coin
coins.details: Copies the abilities of another being or coin

coins.name: empower coin
coins.details: Buffs other holders of a face coin with the owner's stats
coins.cons: the user temporarily loses all abilities

coins.name: Harvest Night Saint coin
coins.details: Allows the owner to communicate with other holders over long distances and receives the guild leader's abilities
coins.cons: if you are not a member of the guild you cannot communicate with the guild members and you don't get the leadership bonus, gives guild leader more power

coins.name: transform coin
coins.details: Allows the user to randomly transform and save the current transformation up to a total of 4 transformations
coins.cons: only available for transforming type beings

coins.name: the literal god coin
coins.details: become immortal for 20 seconds and adds god like abilities for this time

coins.name: battle rage coin
coins.details: Buffs the user's critical strike by 20% and adds extra abilities while in battle

coins.name: weapon coin
coins.details: Gives the user lightning based weapon abilities

coins.name: damage buff coin
coins.details: increases damage done based on the being's age

coins.name: purge coin
coins.details: removes all abilities from a being permanently
coins.cons: can only be used by npcs

coins.name: berserk coin
coins.details: attack negates armor

coins.name: curse coin
coins.details: casts a random curse on a target

coins.name: inheritance coin
coins.details: When you die your last stats get added to your party members for the duration of the fight
coins.cons: your party loses this buff if you are resurrected

coins.name: necromancer coin
coins.details: resurrect a party member

coins.name: borrow coin
coins.details: takes an item from a party member

coins.name: steal coin
coins.details: takes an item from an enemy

coins.name: plenty coin
coins.details: increases gold from loot by 20%

coins.name: armour coin
coins.details: increases resistance to physical damage by 20%

coins.name: warp coin
coins.details: increases speed and decreases physical ability cooldown by 15%

coins.name: nullify coin
coins.details: remove any debuffs

coins.name: defence coin
coins.details: prevents burn and electrocution damage

coins.name: shield coin
coins.details: blocks physical attacks for the health of the shield

coins.name: charge coin
coins.details: electric based attacks reduce the wielders cooldowns

coins.name: float coin
coins.details: change your vertical position to avoid attacks

coins.name: multiply coin
coins.details: triples the number of enemies of the targeted type

coins.name: spark coin
coins.details: gives the user a range of fire type abilities

coins.name: slow coin
coins.details: slows the user down for a period of time

coins.name: conjure coin
coins.details: create an item

coins.name: key coin
coins.details: open any lock except forbidden ones

coins.name: titan coin
coins.details: grow your size and increase physical damage

coins.name: shrink coin
coins.details: shrink your size

coins.name: prevention coin
coins.details: stop your target from using their coins for a time

coins.name: expansion coin
coins.details: increases your attack area

coins.name: contraction coin
coins.details: decreases your attack area and increases damage
displays an area around enemies and allies of coins you also hold
expands your area of vision
pulls a player or object towards you
pushes a player or object away from you
freezes a player or object in place for a period of time
add hammer like blows to your physical atttacks
increases the stats of an item
reconstitute a being from remaining parts
hardens your body again certain attacks and abilities
gain extra abilities, senses and stats
remove stun or other effects
electrocute on touch
absorb electric based damage up to a limit
